project.name: OpenVeo Devices API
project.description: Node.js API exposed by OpenVeo Devices API Plugin

controllers.name: controllers
controllers.description: Include all plugin's controllers to handle HTTP or socket messages.

devices.name: devices
devices.description: All supported devices with their associated pilots.

DeviceSocketController.name: DeviceSocketController
DeviceSocketController.description: Defines a base controller to handle socket messages from devices.

params.name: devicesType
params.description: The type of devices associated to the controller

params.name: namespace
params.description:
The socket namespace managed by this controller.
See [OpenVeo API documentation](https://github.com/veo-labs/openveo-api) for more information about SocketNamespace

VeoboxController.name: VeoboxController
VeoboxController.description: Defines a socket controller to handle messages from [Veoboxes](http://www.veo-labs.com/veobox).

params.name: namespace
params.description:
The socket namespace managed by this controller.
See [OpenVeo API documentation](https://github.com/veo-labs/openveo-api) for more information about SocketNamespace

VeoboxPilot.name: VeoboxPilot
VeoboxPilot.description: Defines a pilot to interact with [Veobox devices](http://www.veo-labs.com/veobox).

params.name: devicesEmitter
params.description: The devices' emitter to listen to devices' messages

params.name: namespace
params.description: The namespace associated to the devices

VEOBOX_MESSAGES.name: VEOBOX_MESSAGES
VEOBOX_MESSAGES.description: Defines the list of socket messages sent by Veobox's devices.

VEOBOX_STATUSES.name: VEOBOX_STATUSES
VEOBOX_STATUSES.description: Defines the list of Veobox statuses.

DeviceError.name: DeviceError
DeviceError.description: Defines an error returned by a device with its id.

params.name: id
params.description: The device id the error belongs to

DevicePilot.name: DevicePilot
DevicePilot.description:
Defines a base pilot for all devices' pilots.

A DevicePilot interacts with a particular type of devices.
It emits events received by the devices and offers methods to control them.

params.name: namespace
params.description: The socket namespace associated to the devices

TYPES.name: TYPES
TYPES.description: Defines the list of available devices' types.

DevicesApiPluginApi.name: DevicesApiPluginApi

devicesPilotsManager.name: devicesPilotsManager
devicesPilotsManager.description:
Stores the list of devices' pilots.

One pilot per type of devices.

classitems.description: The devices' pilot associated to the controller.

classitems.description: Asks a device.
classitems.name: askForSettings

params.name: messageId
params.description: The id of the message to send to the device

params.name: data
params.description: Data to send to the device

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Null** Always null
 - **Array** Results for each device with :
   - **DeviceError** error An error if something went wrong
   - **String** value The device's id

classitems.description: Asks a device for its settings (status, storage, inputs and presets).
classitems.name: askForSettings

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise

classitems.description: Available messages.
classitems.name: MESSAGES

classitems.description: Available statuses.
classitems.name: STATUSES

classitems.description:
Asks for devices' settings.

Asks devices for status, storage, inputs and presets.
classitems.name: askForSettings

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when it's done with :
 - **Null** Always null
 - **Array** Results for each device

classitems.description: Asks for devices' names.

Function to call when it's done with :

Function to call when it's done with :

Function to call when it's done with :

 - **Array** Results for each device
